Posts.Content: Hi ,    My husband and daughte r will be with me , i had very little sleep last night, do much this is playing on my mind , i think ill be a lot better wh en i kno w the outcome and can go forward.big hugs xxz
Posts.Title: Results day looming

Posts.Content: My results day is now only 3 days away , the 2  weeks has flown to be honest .     I am getting increasingly stressed now , i really dont know how i am going to react if its not good news       I am a relatively strong person and want to hold it together , but not sure ill be able to .     I am sure the doctors are used to dealing with this all the time , but i was in tears when i had the biopsy because the doctor said it didnt look benign , can anyone tell me who gives me the results , is it the doctor who took the biopsy? Who else will be there ?      I need to prepare myself for this and knowing will help me get through it xx
Posts.Title: Results day looming

Posts.Content: Hi,   Thankyou , the support on here is amazing , we are all in the same position , i h ave days when im positive , but today isnt one o f those , ithink ive maybe prepared myself too much in the sense of knowing my outcome , its the thought of what ive got to got through next I think ,and trying to be strong and brave for my family , im not a weak person generally but this like all of us im sure has knocked me for six .Im sure my family who have been amazing will be aware that i may not take the result well , i cried when the doctor said it didnt look benign . What is it about the word Cancer we dread , i will get through this , and im sure when i get the result i will be able to go forward.I have a clear idea of what will happen now xxx sending hugs xxx
Posts.Title: Results day looming

Posts.Content: Hi Tina, The foreign resolved ,but now this .Seems you have lots of issues too though I wish you well going forward,I was hoping for reconstruction soon ,but I'm good whilst I have this i can't have it .I'll let you know what my surgeon says .Xx
Posts.Title: Issues after surgery

Posts.Content: Should say cording
Posts.Title: Issues after surgery

Posts.Content: Hi all , today i had my follow up after my lumpectomy to a very bad result .Sentinel node has cancer cells and surgeon wants also to remove lymph glands now and feels he needs to reopen where i had lumpectomy and remove more tissue as he feels that enough clear margin hasnt been removed . Has anyone else had this , i am a wreck right now, feel gutted ive got to go through all this again in 3 weeks time , when i thought it was all done apart from radiotherapy Xxx
Posts.Title: Second Operation

Posts.Content: Hi, Im 4 weeks post surgery from having my masectomy .All went well , getting used to a false one , but planning reconstruction in a year or so .I also had full lymph node clearance , and now need physio due to cording .On Monday I see the oncologist to discuss my next stage, which is likely to be chemo , which im not looking forward to , but if thats what i need ill go with it and then hopefully im out the other side .Apart from hormone therapy for the next 10 years.Its a long road but im getting , therexx
Posts.Title: Second Operation

Posts.Content: Hi ,"your so right, the stress is dreadful , you think your getting there and then bang something else.Ive had a shit time , like so many of us , but im a lot stronger person than I was 4 months ago. I will ask about that test , and thankyou , worth knowing So plrased for you your out the other side , hopefully that will.be me in 18 months time X
Posts.Title: Second Operation

Posts.Content: Hi all, havent been on for a while , 6 months post masectomy and lymph gland surgery and having been through physio for cording which was severe im looking for advice really.I have since physio developed tendonitis in my arm and this is getting worse , painfull movement and very debilitating .Scans been done and thankfully no sign of any cancer recurrence. I have had physio and hydrotherapy with no improvement.It seems that the next step could be a cortisone injection , i see my surgeon next week .I am not sure if this is a huge risk in developing lymphedema, and im worried abour this , obviuosly.Anyone else had this or had this problem.I would be very grateful for any comments as i want to be prepared when its discussed. Ive done great in alk other areas its just this ccausing me a big problem .Thankyou Xxx
Posts.Title: Issues after surgery

Posts.Content: Hi , i see my specialist next Friday , and im sure he will get to the bottom of it.Ive asked my breast care team ifit could be lymohadema and they say not. I have fluid in the biceps tendon sheath , upper arm , same side as masectomy , fluid shouldnt be there am been told its tendonitis , but i will be asking again about lymohadema. I am on lezitrole hormone therapy , which is interesting you say about tendon issues.Hoping to get some help soon though as its driving me nuts Xxx
Posts.Title: Issues after surgery

Posts.Content: Hi Jac, it sucks big time , feel a bit better today , but i have my moments I think this time they may say Masectomy as im so tiny 32A and it will leave very little , untill my case is discussed i wont know , so waiting for final decision . Ive made my mind up that i think iits the right option fo r me now, cant be a probkem with margin if its all gone can there . This forum is amazing , and without support i think id crack sending hugs xxx.
Posts.Title: Second Operation

Posts.Content: God , im 32A and lost a quarter so far , im tiny so after op 2 there will be little left .I do think my best option now is Masectomy and was told in the place my surgeon preffered that route re my size , i opted forumpectomy !!! That do esnt change that all my lymph node bioosy were clear but in facr they are not , that is what is do gutting .im no w stage 2 and no t 1 .Ill get there but this is a rough ride .love this forum you are all amazing sending hugs Xxx
Posts.Title: Second Operation

Posts.Content: Thank s Jane ,    I dont know why but icalways feel better when ive been on the forum and im guessing its because we are all in this together , all in different scenarios with the same diagnosis  Someone did tell me it could suddenly hit me , think that hapoened yesterday , wasnt prepared for it at all.     I have cried a few times but not really let out my emotions fully , all m y friends say im a strong person , on the outside , they dont see the inside , i do have amazing friends and family support but i will find that thread.   Thankyou for being there for me it does make so much difference , sometimes i think i try to be too strong for my family as i dont want them to see me broken , a good weekend needed i think with lots of positive  thoughts .  Sending hugs Xxx
Posts.Title: After Results

Posts.Content: Hi,   Thankyou , you are very kind , yes we can compare notes , this fo rum makes so much difference and im so pleased to hear your doing great Xxx Hugs
Posts.Title: After Results

Posts.Content: Hi Karen,     Lovely to hear youve had your op and sounds like your the same senario as me .    Great your op seems to have hapoened quickly and i was told within a month , so im hoping ill hear soon.       Feel better already having gone on the forum, it helps me massively .     Can i ask if it was just day surgery , im told it is , and how were you afterwards , i know we are all different but it just helps me i guess , think im one of those who needs info and facts , then i can deal with i t .   Sending hugs and so pleased you seem to be doing great Xxx
Posts.Title: After Results

Posts.Content: Hi ,   You are exactly the same as me , mine is very small 17mm and oestragen receptive , lymph nodes clear , but im told they  still remove some during the op.Where do you live as i have been told i will have my op within the next month , in East Sussex ,  yours is super speedy, wish mine was too .all mne oitherwise has been very quick , from mammogram to diagnosis ehich was Weds .    I hope evrthing goes well for you andpĺease post your progress , i gave been on here a lot  Everyone is so supportive and amazing , sending you big hugs Xx
Posts.Title: After Results

Posts.Content: Hi ,    I got my results on Wednesday, was feeling good and positive , early diagnosis , very small tumour ,lymph glands clear .     Yestetday i suddenly hit me i think , i have breast cancer , i should be positive i know , but the speed at which this has all hapoened , the waiting for the results , im not feeling great right now , thoughht id dealt with it all and could go forward, feel totally in limbo waiting for a date for my operation , feeling scared of the next stage , i dont know what my treatment will be yet , all these in my mind.    There are probably thousands like me right now, i am lucky i guess that mine is very early , but its still cancer .     I keep thinking by the time i get my op it could be bigger , it could  have spread , stupid thoughts , i know , but still there !     This forum is great and the support is amazing , just had to let this out this morning    Big hugs everyone Xxx
Posts.Title: After Results

Posts.Content: So today i have been diagnosed with Stage 1 breast cancer , lymph nodes are clear which is good , if anyrhing can be good.   I wasnt shocked , after being toldcit didnt look benign on the ultra sound its really what I expected.    Im relieved today is over and im told su rgery will be within the month , big hugs to everyone Xxx
Posts.Title: Diagnosed Today

Posts.Content: Hi    Thankyou , to be honestvi feel better now i know the result and can mobe fo rwards .    The online support seems great , i will definaetly do that , i was mo re shocked in the beginning i think , still hard to take in though xxx   Sending hugs xx
Posts.Title: Diagnosed Today

Posts.Content: Hi   The doctor said no chemo , i was in Brighton and my hospital is Hastings so he said they would di scuss the treatment , im guessing radiotherapy ,but not sure yet xxx
Posts.Title: Diagnosed Today

Posts.Content: Hi ,    Feel relieved to be honest and it could of been worse , i know it seems silly but the fear of it all has gone Xx      Sending hugs xxx

Just want to get on with it now , hoping the wait wonr be too long xx    Sending hugs Xxx
